metadata.synopsis: One-liner for a sous chef that just got yelled at by the chef in the kitchen at Jannath Estate.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Interact with Sous Chef at CTY_Main_A -265; 25; -58

0.speaker: Falura the Sous-Chef
0.text: Shhh. You'll get me in trouble.
0.context: NodeContext: On edge, just had an earful from the boss

1.speaker: Falura the Sous-Chef
1.text: No small talk in the kitchen. Chef's orders.
1.context: NodeContext: On edge, just had an earful from the boss
